files.patch:
@@ -41,0 +41,9 @@
+// Workaround for noexcept functions in glibc when using clang.
+// clang errors if declaration without exception specification preceeds
+// noexcept declaration, but not the other way around.
+#ifdef __clang__
+#include <stdio.h>
+#include <string.h>
+#include <wchar.h>
+#endif
+
